data.name: SCP: Observer
data.detailed_description:
SCP Observer



SCP Observer is a frightening experience, where you play as 2 security guards, who try to survive the event of their life. To survive you have to manage the power carefully, monitor the foundation's camera system for threats and defend yourself against oncoming horros. Do all of this while you wait for an MTF unit to reach your position and you might survive.

You can play the official "Story Mode" or you can create your own Scenario with full control over difficulty and map selection.

Light Containment Zone


The Light Containment Zone is primarily used for containment and storage, mostly of lower-level SCP objects, such as SCP-173 and SCP-914. It is characterized by its high roofed, concrete architecture and contains the following SCPs:

  • SCP-035 - A Possessive Mask able to control everything its placed upon. It will do anything, to escape the Foundation and he will kill everyone coming in his way.
  • SCP-173 – A mere concrete sculpture, upon first glance. On second glance, you’ll notice it’s somehow closer. There is no third glance — you're dead by then.
  • SCP-3199 - An egg-laying Monster, trying to hunt down anything, that poses a thread to his brood
  • And more...

Heavy Containment Zone


The Heavy Containment Zone is strictly used for the containment of high-level SCP objects, such as SCP-106 and SCP-049. Due to this, it is constructed with a distinctive rudimentary style, abundant with grimy tunnels and catwalks. It contains the following SCPs:

  • SCP-049 – An archaic plague doctor with the sole intent of “curing” those ridden with the “pestilence”. Contact means death and not much can stop him.
  • SCP-079 – A sentient A.I. that has access to most of the facility's hardware and monitoring systems. With the facility under its control, beware the doors you lock tight for safety becoming the reason for your demise.
  • SCP-939 – A predator that intelligently mimics human voices to deceive and entrap its desired prey. Don't fall for stray imitations, lest you’re repaid with a bite.
  • SCP-966 - A predatory creature that hunts its prey while they sleep. It is invisible by normal means, but you can see it by switching your camera filter, which costs power.
  • And more...

We die in the dark so others may live in the light.

data.short_description: SCP Observer is a survival horror game, where you are trapped in a security room and you have to monitor the foundations camera system for threats and manage the power carefully in order to survive. All of this while you try not to be killed by some of the SCP Foundation most terrifying creatures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10; 64 bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 310 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: More will be added in the future
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10; 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: More will be added in the future
